Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: ナイラ
Entry.EnglishText: Nayla

Entry.JapaneseText: アムジル
Entry.EnglishText: Amjeel

Entry.JapaneseText: ギリオーヌ
Entry.EnglishText: Gilione

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: トーマ
Entry.EnglishText: Tohma

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ
Entry.EnglishText: Agarte

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァ
Entry.EnglishText: Militsa

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>の影
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>'s Shadow

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ギリオーヌの聖殿
Entry.EnglishText: Shrine of Gilione

Entry.JapaneseText: ギリオーヌの聖殿
Entry.EnglishText: Shrine of Gilione

Entry.JapaneseText: キャッキャッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Googoo~

Entry.JapaneseText: あなた……!! <Hilda>が……<Hilda>が、 こんなに元気に笑ってる……
Entry.EnglishText: Darling! <Hilda> is... Look at how much she's cooing!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、もう大丈夫だ…… 俺たちの子は…… <Hilda>は強い子だ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, she's going to be alright now. Our child... Our <Hilda> is a strong girl!

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたが……聖獣ギリオーヌ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Are you... the Sacred Beast Gilione?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだ。私がギリオーヌだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, I am Gilione.

Entry.JapaneseText: 「自分が何者かを知れ。 道は汝の中にある」…… おまえはその意味を見出し、 ここに来た……
Entry.EnglishText: “Become aware of what you are. The path lies within yourself.” You've travelled all this way to discover what that means...

Entry.JapaneseText: ここに至る間に見たすべては、 おまえの身体に刻まれた歴史。 すなわち、おまえ自身。
Entry.EnglishText: What you have witnessed on this journey is the history carved into your flesh. In other words, it makes up your very being.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、おまえの迷いは依然として、 その心を揺さぶっているようだ。
Entry.EnglishText: However, I sense that doubt yet plagues your heart, as it always has.

Entry.JapaneseText: ゆえに、私はおまえの望みを かなえる事にした。
Entry.EnglishText: Therefore, I have decided to grant your wish.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私の望み……!?
Entry.EnglishText: My wish?

Entry.JapaneseText: これは……
Entry.EnglishText: What is this?

Entry.JapaneseText: 純粋なヒューマと 純粋なガジュマの身体だ。 おまえの望む美しい身体だ。 好きなほうをおまえに与えよう。
Entry.EnglishText: What you see before you are the beautiful forms you have always desiredー the body of a pure Huma and the body of a pure Gajuma. I shall grant you whichever one you like.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は……私が望むのは……
Entry.EnglishText: What... What I want is...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんと気味の悪い子なんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: What a creepy looking kid...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえはヒューマでも ガジュマでもないハーフだ。
Entry.EnglishText: You aren't a Huma or a Gajuma at all. You're a Half.

Entry.JapaneseText: ハーフの何がいけないの!?
Entry.EnglishText: What's wrong with being a Half?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマになれ。 我らのごとく美しいガジュマに。
Entry.EnglishText: Become a Gajuma. You could be a beautiful Gajuma like myself.
No!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマこそ美しきもの。 ヒューマの身体を選びなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: Huma are beautiful. Choose the body of a Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 違う!! そうじゃない!! そんなものは必要ない!!
Entry.EnglishText: No! That's not right! I don't need this!

Entry.JapaneseText: この醜い身体を捨てない限り、 私たちに居場所などない。 このままハーフとして 生きていくつもりか？
Entry.EnglishText: So long as we refuse to throw away these unsightly bodies, we will never have a place to call home. Do you really want to keep living as a Half?

Entry.JapaneseText: やめて!! やめてぇぇぇッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Stop! Stop it!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 早く選びなさいよ！ ヒューマにするの？ ガジュマにするの？ やっと願いがかなうのよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Hurry and make your choice! Will you be a Huma? Or will you be a Gajuma? Your dreams are about to come true!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……いらない…… 私は、ヒューマの身体も ガジュマの身体も欲しくない…… 私には……必要ない！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't need that. I don't want the body of a Huma or the body of a Gajuma. I... I don't need such a thing!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……純粋な身体を必要としない。 それが、おまえの本心なのか？
Entry.EnglishText: ...So you've rejected my offer. Is this truly what your heart desires?

Entry.JapaneseText: 角を折るほどに忌み嫌った ハーフの身体のままで 良いというのか？
Entry.EnglishText: You're fine with remaining in the body of a Half? The body you despised to the point where you broke off your own horns?

Entry.JapaneseText: 私の身体は…… 父と母がくれたこの身体は……
Entry.EnglishText: This body... is the body that was given to me by my mother and father...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……私の誇りよ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I'm proud of it.

Entry.JapaneseText: ならば、試させてもらおう……
Entry.EnglishText: Very well. Then I have one last trial for you.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえの心に迷いがない事を…… おまえが、我が力を与えるに 足る者である事を……
Entry.EnglishText: Prove to me that your heart no longer harbors doubt. Prove to me that you are worthy of wielding my power...

Entry.JapaneseText: 己自身を乗り越えよ…… これが、最後の試練だ。
Entry.EnglishText: You must triumph over yourself! This shall be your final test.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><Hilda>を含む パーティ編成にしてください。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Form a party that includes <Hilda>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 見事だ……
Entry.EnglishText: Excellent...

Entry.JapaneseText: これまでのおまえは、 ハーフである事を拒絶し、 その力を解放する事に ためらいがあった。
Entry.EnglishText: Your entire life, you have rejected your Half body and even the unique power that comes along with it.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、おまえは、 ハーフである自分を受け入れ、 過去を乗り越えた……
Entry.EnglishText: However, now at last you have accepted yourself as you are and overcome your past.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今、おまえが発した光は、 その証だ。
Entry.EnglishText: The light that radiates from you now is proof of that.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ハーフじゃない……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm...not a Half.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は……半分ずつのハーフなんかじゃない。 私はガジュマであり、ヒューマでもある。 そして、ガジュマでもヒューマでもない。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not some kind of split being. I'm both Huma and Gajuma, and yet... I'm neither Huma nor Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は……<Yellow>ヒト<White>…… ただの<Yellow>ヒト<White>よ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm...a <Yellow>person.<White> Just a <Yellow>person.<White>

Entry.JapaneseText: それが、おまえの 見つけた答なのか。
Entry.EnglishText: Is that your final resolve?

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな立派なものじゃない…… 私は、ただ気づいただけ。 ……自分が何者か、って事に。 それに……
Entry.EnglishText: It's nothing as noble as that. I've just finally realized what I really am... And not only that...

Entry.JapaneseText: 角を折るべきじゃ なかったって……
Entry.EnglishText: I now know that I shouldn't have broken off my horns.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>よ、 我が<Purple>光の力<White>を求めるか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>, do you seek my <Purple>Force of Light?<White>

Entry.JapaneseText: 求める。
Entry.EnglishText: I do.

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスを……
Entry.EnglishText: Present your Force.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえの両親がここを訪れた時、 私は、その二人の間に生まれた ハーフの子供に<Yellow>希望<White>を感じた。
Entry.EnglishText: When your parents came to this place all those years ago, I felt the <Yellow>hope<White> that the two of them carried in their hearts for their child.

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族という意識を変える きっかけのひとつになるかも しれないと……
Entry.EnglishText: I sensed that you may be the one who can alter the perception of what "race" truly is.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私が……<Yellow>希望<White>……？
Entry.EnglishText: I am...<Yellow>hope?<White>

Entry.JapaneseText: その身体で生きていく事を 決意したおまえの姿に、 <Yellow>ヒト<White>は<Yellow>希望<White>を見るだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: People will look upon the <Yellow>body<White> that you have resolved to embrace and see <Yellow>hope<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: その身体を誇りに思うおまえの心は、 <Yellow>ヒト<White>の<Yellow>希望<White>となるだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: The pride that you now have in yourself will become a <Yellow>hope<White> to others.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえが、我が<Purple>光の力<White>に 呑まれぬ事を願う。
Entry.EnglishText: I pray that you will not be overwhelmed by my <Purple>Force of Light.<White>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>幻の島<White>を探せ。 それが最後の聖獣、 ランドグリーズへの道だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Seek out the <Blue>Island of Illusions.<White> There lies the path to the final Sacred Beast, Randgritz.

Entry.JapaneseText: ランドグリーズ…… <Blue>幻の島<White>を探せ……
Entry.EnglishText: Randgriz...on the <Blue>Island of Illusions.<White>

Entry.JapaneseText: さあ、行くが良い。 残された時間は少ない。
Entry.EnglishText: Now, you must go! You do not have much time left.

Entry.JapaneseText: 急ごう。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's get going.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><Hilda>は 奥義『ディバインセイバー』が 習得可能になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><Hilda> can now learn the Fusion Force "Divine Saber."

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>さん……
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……うん。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I know.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: ……前に来た時には、 こんなものはなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: ...There was nothing like this the last time we were here.
Entry.Notes: I believe dialogue changes on character - this one's Veigue

Entry.JapaneseText: ラッキー!! 前に来た時には 何もなかったのに！
Entry.EnglishText: Lucky! We didn't see anything like this last time!

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……以前、ここには 何もなかったと思うが……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... I don't think there was anything last time...

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか、こんなところに…… とても意外な感じね。
Entry.EnglishText: I would never imagine that in a place like this... This is really unexpected.

Entry.JapaneseText: おう、こんなとこに発見が！ おどろき桃の木だぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: To think you can find a peach tree here in a place like this!

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなところに…… そう、こんな事もあるのね。
Entry.EnglishText: In a place like this... Right, such things can be found.

Entry.JapaneseText: 初めてのアイテム会話
Entry.EnglishText: First Time Item Conversation

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、 何か見つかる場合が あるという事か……
Entry.EnglishText: If we go check places we already visited, we will probably find something new...

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行ったところでも、 調べに行ったら、 新しい発見があるかもネ！
Entry.EnglishText: If we go to places we already visited before, we might find a new discovery!

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、 新しい発見があるかもしれんな。
Entry.EnglishText: If we go check any places we visited before, we may discover something new, you know.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、こうやって 調べたら何かみつかるかも……？
Entry.EnglishText: Even if we've been here before, we may find something new if we investigate...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 前に行った場所でも、 もういっぺん行ってみたら、 何か見つかるかもしれないな！
Entry.EnglishText: If we go to places we already visited before, we might find something new!

Entry.JapaneseText: 行った事がある場所でも、 もう一度調べたら、何か見つかる かもしれないって事ね……
Entry.EnglishText: If we go check places we already visited, we could probably find something new...

Entry.JapaneseText: 初めてのアイテム会話
Entry.EnglishText: First Time Item Conversation
